projectsList.title: ChainAlert - Blockchain Transaction Monitoring
projectsList.description: B2B/B2C SaaS platform for real-time Ethereum transaction monitoring with Telegram notifications
features: Telegram Bot Interface for wallet and settings management
Customizable alert thresholds based on transaction amounts
Subscription-based model with three pricing tiers
Track up to 50 wallets per account (Pro plan)

projectsList.title: Telegram Chat Analyzer - AI Portfolio Generator
projectsList.description: Automated tool for generating developer portfolio from Telegram chat exports using Claude AI
features: Automatic Telegram export (JSON) analysis via Claude API
Extract professional experience, projects, and skills from conversations
Detailed token usage and cost statistics
Automatic large file handling (skip chats >180K tokens)
Portfolio export in JSON and Markdown formats
